By the way: In french it is TBSP, not TBPS (transaction¬†Bitcoin sign√©e partiellement (TBSP))
Please make these changes on Transifex. They are pulled into this repository before release.
I know, I'm sorry I made them here, but I don't know how to navigate on transifex in French because I don't speak French ü§£

Maybe you could please send this to someone responsible for French translations (I just found this via a search in the bitcoin repository for mistakes, but I can't find it on transifex, I'm sorry üò¢ )
cc @AO-LocLab as a French translation coordinator.

comments.body:
FWIW these changes appear incorrect.

The idiomatic phrase is "transaction Bitcoin partiellement sign√©e", and so the locale file is correct as-is.
